class Ability[source]

Ability(damage, damage_type)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Character[source]

Character(name, max_health, ability)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Mage[source]

Mage(name, max_health, ability) :: Character

This is the main class for the player

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mage = Mage("Natahan", 100, Ability(10, "water"))
print(mage)

Natahan's Current Health: 100
        Natahan's Max Health: 100
        Natahan's Ability Damage: 10
        Natahan's Ability Type: water
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Demon[source]

Demon(name, max_health) :: Character

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
demon = Demon("Terry", 100)
print(demon)

Terry's Current Health: 100
        Terry's Max Health: 100
        Terry's Ability Damage: 10
        Terry's Ability Type: fire
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Mage.attack[source]

Mage.attack(target)

Attack the given enemy

{% endraw %}

I will now demonstrate how to attack a demon!

bolding ital {% include note.html content='this is a note' %}{% include warning.html content='this is a warning' %}

{% raw %} 
mage.attack(demon)
print(demon)

From Natahan's wand, ice cold water is flung towards Terry.
        Terry's Current Health: 80
        Terry's Max Health: 100
        Terry's Ability Damage: 10
        Terry's Ability Type: fire
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
